This is not related to the text editor at all. Your plug-in probably runs in
compatibility mode i.e. you require "org.eclipse.core.runtime.compatibility" in
your plugin.xml. You can either run in compatibility mode in which your plug-in
is created with the 1-arg constructor or remove it from your required section
and then the 0-arg constructor will be invoked.
